title: Audio Converter
description: Convert between MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, and other audio formats

sections.title: About Audio Conversion
content: Convert audio files between popular formats while maintaining sound quality and optimizing file sizes.

sections.title: Supported Formats
content: MP3 - Most popular compressed audio format
AAC - Advanced audio codec, iTunes standard

sections.title: Common Use Cases
content: Convert WAV to MP3 to reduce file size
Convert MP3 to FLAC for better quality
